title: Mazinger Z vs. Devilman
alternative_title: Mazinger Z tai Devilman, マジンガーＺ対デビルマン
description: The Evil Demon Clan is attacking!Only the Super-Robot Mazinger Z can save us.And here comes Devilman, the good one of the Demon Clan.He will help you defeat Dr. Hell and Lord Zennon, the leaders of the Demon Clan!Go, Mazinger Z!!!
